name: Virtue Insight's Pharma Innovation Tech Congress 2024
content: 4th Annual Pharma Innovation Tech Congress 2024 “AI, Blockchain, Big Data, IoT, & Digitalisation for Pharma” 29th Aug 2024, Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre, Hyderabad, India The pharmaceutical industry is at the forefront of artificial intelligence (AI) adoption, harnessing cutting-edge patents to revolutionize drug development and research processes. The impact of AI extends beyond the pharmaceutical sector, influencing various industries. It is high time that we look into innovative strategies, new technologies, effective and quality collaborations to get better in this competitive world with the pharma industry. It gives us immense pleasure in welcoming you to the 4th Annual Pharma Innovation Tech Congress 2024\. Please contact Email - E-mail - kavitha@virtueinsight.co.in or M: +91 9361957193 / +91 44 24762472 SPONSORS: Gold Sponsor - Scitara We also have more sponsorship opportunities available for the event, which gives you an opportunity to exhibit/booth/speak and create brand awareness. You can simply email your interest and queries to kavitha@virtueinsight.co.in DELEGATE REGISTRATION: • SUPER EARLY BIRD ( Valid until 5th July 2024 ) – 11,000 + GST (18%) per delegate • EARLY BIRD ( Valid until 2nd Aug 2024 ) – 14,000 + GST (18%) per delegate • Standard Price ( Valid from 3rd Aug 2024 )- INR 16,000 + GST (18%) per delegate
